metadata.title: A Rational Approach to Estimating the Surgical Demand Elasticity Needed to Guide Manpower Reallocation during Contagious Outbreaks

abstract.original_text: Emerging infectious diseases continue to pose serious threats to global public health. So far, however, few published study has addressed the need for manpower reallocation needed in hospitals when such a serious contagious outbreak occurs.

sentences.segment_text: Emerging infectious diseases continue to pose serious threats to global public health .
So far , however , few published study has addressed the need for manpower reallocation needed in hospitals when such a serious contagious outbreak occurs .

abstract.original_text: To quantify the demand elasticity of the major surgery types in order to guide future manpower reallocation during contagious outbreaks.

sentences.segment_text: To quantify the demand elasticity of the major surgery types in order to guide future manpower reallocation during contagious outbreaks .

abstract.original_text: Based on a nationwide research database in Taiwan, we extracted the monthly volumes of major surgery types for the period 1998-2003, which covered the SARS period, in order to carry out a time series analysis. The demand elasticity of each surgery type was then estimated by autoregressive integrated moving average (ARIMA) analysis.
